description.value:
At 1st level, the Undead lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Spell Level Spells
1st @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.Hj5boJxDzzVxwtNw]{Bane}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.2qTBrY7kenAWLwTz]{False Life}
2nd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.GF3MCaxFoFwiSh8F]{Blindness/Deafness}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.L9I53ZZT4z6Q7Ypa]{Phantasmal Force}
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.zi41IRdwFsQWlwJB]{Phantom Steed}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.Z1dPExUkSVfR3Z10]{Speak with Dead}
4th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.3x7HVJ1Ube01KuDI]{Death Ward}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.heHdo5e6AQ4DULiR]{Greater Invisibility}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.iusFRYv0kuzXVDmg]{Antilife Shell}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.pgfEb63k38KiSHoh]{Cloudkill}

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
